website_summaries.verdict: While you'll probably want to upgrade the seat before heading out for extensive paddling, this option offers a lot of stability at a good price.
pros: Easy to paddle and tracks well on the water
Users sit lower than in other sit-on-tops, giving this model great stability
cons: The seat has minimal padding and could offer more support
Lacks scupper or drainage holes in the bottom

customer_reviews.title: Stable and plenty of storage
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to upgrade from my Intex inflatable 2-person kayak, which introduced me to the great joy of kayaking. I love the Intex but always say in a puddle of water and it was a pain to inflate and deflate. The Sun dolphin was a great choice for me! I’m 5’7 and 240 lbs and this kayak was super stable, easy to maneuver on the water, and I can lift it and get it tied down on top of my car by myself. I tested it out on a nearby lake yesterday and absolutely can not wait to take it out again!
customer_reviews.author: C. McGrady

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: first time out a molded seam broke and the kayak filled with water and began slashing until it capsized
customer_reviews.author: paul petty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, im 6'2" and about 270#. Paddles good, floats and doesn't sink. Im happy.
customer_reviews.author: WM

customer_reviews.title: Nice Kayak.  So-so quality.
customer_reviews.text: Good kayak. Not quite as stable as I was hoping for, but it does the job. The build quality is up in the air still. I have a feeling there will be a piece or two broken off in the not-too-distant future. Pretty big, so plenty of room. Seat needs a higher seat back with more support, though. After a few hours of paddling, my back was really killing me.
customer_reviews.author: ArchitectThom

customer_reviews.title: Does not track
customer_reviews.text: Does not track at all, also after first use in choppy water the hull started to fill up with water
customer_reviews.author: Wahlyworld

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable at all
customer_reviews.text: The seat on this is very uncomfortable. I'd rather spend more money and get a more comfortable kayak. I wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Nack

customer_reviews.title: Tracks well
customer_reviews.text: I love this Kayak! It is long enough that it tracks really well and is pretty stable with my 50 lbs. Boxer in the boat. It takes a little practice with the my dog on both our parts. I would suggest that only experienced kayakers get this kayak if you plan to take your
customer_reviews.author: Chelsiekayt

customer_reviews.title: I love it! It moves through the water quickly
customer_reviews.text: My first kayak. I love it! It moves through the water quickly. Very easy to steer and maneuver. The lime green color really stands out nicely. The OEM seat will need to be replaced, with a more comfortable and supportive one. Like the two storage compartments. It only weighs 48 lbs., so easy to handle and load by myself. Also very stable in the water. Able to enter and dismount the boat easily. Great purchase. Very satisfied. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Zon P

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Boat, Easily handled
customer_reviews.text: Easy to handle, plenty of storage for those long "paddling" days. Not tippy, sits nice and low.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Dents when deliveried
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two kayaks and they both had dents in the front of them when we took the plastic off of them.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: So like most people
customer_reviews.text: So like most people, I first tried to go cheap to get into Kayaking. I bought a 10 ft Sundolphin. I am 6'2" and 260 lbs. I was too heavy for it. When I sat in it, water came in the scuppers, instead of flowing out. I could paddle around, but I felt I was sitting on a tightrope. Way unstable. So I passed that kayak onto my wife, and bought this 12 ft. WHAT a difference! Very stable, easy to control.. I love it..
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Why did we wait so long.....
customer_reviews.text: We are beginners at kayaking and this is our first kayak. We utilize this kayak on a fresh water lake and it maneuvers well under these conditions. We plan to purchase a second Sun Dolphin soon!
customer_reviews.author: LLD

customer_reviews.title: Rivets Pulled Out
customer_reviews.text: Returned as the rivets holding the seat strap pulled out on the second day of use. This kayak is nice looking and handled well for a cheaper type of kayak but just didn't seem sturdy enough for the long-haul. Ended up getting a much more expensive (and much sturdier) Eddyline which is a "real" kayak, as they say, lol!
customer_reviews.author: F. Wise

customer_reviews.title: I really like this kayak but inside the hull does take on ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this kayak but inside the hull does take on water. Its tough to tip the water out of the little hole. But the kayak works great.
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: Perfect all-around kayak
customer_reviews.text: Perfect all-around kayak!! Lots of space, tracks well, can't beat value for the money! And plenty of space for my passenger! :-D
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: Sits comfortably. But rivits aren't sealed good
customer_reviews.text: Sits comfortably. But rivits aren't sealed good. Boat almost sank. Had to silicon every hole. And change out handles. Paddles smoothly in the water. But seat will fill with water.
customer_reviews.author: Randy E. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is really great. Only 2 things wrong. One the adjustable seat will pop off very easy. Two my cup holder is kinda bent sideways. But still gets me down the river great so everything's good
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Golden

customer_reviews.title: NO SCUPPER HOLES!?
customer_reviews.text: Boat moves well. But its a drenching ride. The kayak has no scupper holes! So if any water gets in..... Youre sitting in it! Come on!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: SOT without drainage
customer_reviews.text: Fit & finish OK, layout fine, but no drainage in inset seat cockpit-- you'll have to bail any slop-over from waves, wakes etc. Sending it back. FYI this would be 3d KL yak we've owned. We liked 'em and fished 'em but scupper-less SOT is, let's say, a design doodle gone bad. I'd tear up that napkin and maybe get some sleep instead of more coffee.
customer_reviews.author: William  L.

customer_reviews.title: that's what you get for this price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kayak 2 months ago. I don't like it. the color doesn't look good. not good at direction
customer_reviews.author: Tut

customer_reviews.title: This kayak is great. It is very stable and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This kayak is great. It is very stable and comfortable. Lots of storage, cup holder and even 2 rod holders. It is perfect and the price is unbelievable
customer_reviews.author: shellybelly

customer_reviews.title: really nice yaks...love them...
customer_reviews.text: i have three of these...kids love them...will have them for a long time...extremely durable
customer_reviews.author: deevee8

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise seems to be in good shape. Delivery went well
customer_reviews.text: Foot paddle was missing. Otherwise seems to be in good shape. Delivery went well. Will see when the weather gets better! No one to contact regarding the missing pedal, so thats not great.
customer_reviews.author: Bananaca

customer_reviews.title: not as stable side to side as my wife's 10' ...
customer_reviews.text: not as stable side to side as my wife's 10' kayak. I'm a big guy but within weight capacity. seat sets lower than feet, and it threw me into a forced recline
customer_reviews.author: heidi m.

product_meta.title: Sun Dolphin Bali SS 12-Foot Sit-on top Kayak
feature_bullets: Tracks and paddles with ease while offering maximum stability
P.A.C. (Portable Accessory Carrier) can be used as extra storage
Storage compartment with shock cord deck rigging
Large, comfortable seating area with protective thigh pads, adjustable foot braces and paddle holder
***IMPORTANT – phone number is needed to schedule a delivery appointment***

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
